metadata.Title: CVE-2018-8786 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
FreeRDP prior to version 2.0.0-rc4 contains an Integer Truncation that leads to a Heap-Based Buffer Overflow in function update_read_bitmap_update() and results in a memory corruption and probably even a remote code execution.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-8786` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

freerdp-x11 - 1.0.2-2ubuntu1.2
libfreerdp-plugins-standard - 1.0.2-2ubuntu1.2
libfreerdp1 - 1.0.2-2ubuntu1.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: freerdp package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.0.2-2ubuntu1.2').
